known_issues: Hearts are missing/disappearing after Version 7 deployment

existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the issue causing all heart notes to disappear from the HeartCanvas after the Version 7 deployment. Ensure that previously stored heart notes are correctly fetched from the backend and rendered on the canvas.

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify that the backend's heart note list and CRUD functions (add, get, list, edit, delete) are functioning correctly and returning data as expected. If the Version 7 deployment introduced any state loss or schema change, restore or migrate the data appropriately.
